wikitext.*:
The '''Hidden Half''' is a note placed below the edge of the world on the Diagram I of the [[Ambarkanta maps]], to reflect the conception of the "round world". The [[Mountains of the West]] and [[Walls of the Sun|East]] prevented anyone from finding the Hidden Half of the world.<ref>{{SM|Ambar}} pp. 242 - 243</ref>
